text: Irma Aguirre Martínez (born 21 December 1934), commonly known as Irma Dorantes, is a Mexican actress. She was born in Mérida, Yucatán. Her career lasted from 1948 until 2014. She sang "La Flor de la Canela". She played supporting roles in telenovelas such as Cuando me enamoro (2010). Dorantes was married to actor Pedro Infante from 1953 until his death in 1957. They had one child. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican singers Category:People from Yucatán (state)
title: Irma Dorantes
